metadata.title: CVE-2021-47078 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/rxe: Clear all QP fields if creation failed rxe_qp_do_cleanup() relieson valid pointer values in QP for the properly created ones, but in caserxe_qp_from_init() failed it was filled with garbage and caused tot thefollowing error. refcount_t: underflow; use-after-free.
